EngageManifest.Title: Two Column
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the image on the left and the content on the right.

The image is 39% of the total content pane width and the content is 59% of the total content pane width.

The pager images appear at the bottom in a horizontal row (with a width of 90% of the total content pane) with a previous and next button on either end.

It is advised to make pager images proportionate to the width of the area and number of slides used for best results.

The pager image for the current slide will have a small border around it.
